text: 'in aladhin yukhfwn ma 'anzalna min alayat alwadhat aldalt ealaa nbwt muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam wama ja' bh, wahum ahbar alyhwd welma' alnasaraa wghyrhm mmn yaktum ma 'anzal allah min baed ma azhrnah lilnaas fi altawrat wal'injyl, 'uwlayik ytrdhm allah min rhmth, wayadeu ealayhim ballent jmye alkhlyqt
